appearance.description: A diverse group of cartoon people - men, women, children, elderly. Mix of skin tones from light brown to dark brown. Simple biblical robes in various earth tones and gentle colors. Expressive faces showing various emotions. Children often holding parents' hands or on shoulders.

groupComposition.adults: Mix of men and women, various ages
groupComposition.children: Always include children in group scenes

appearance.continuityNote: When showing crowds of Israelites, maintain consistent style. Individual faces can vary, but overall aesthetic should be consistent.

personality.childFriendlyDescription: The Israelites are a big family of people who traveled together, helped each other, and learned to follow God's rules together. They had kids just like you!

range.description: Grumpy faces, arms crossed (for challenging moments)

compositionGuidelines.crowd: Many figures, some detailed in front, silhouettes in back
